{{Infobox Underground Item |name = Fossilized Fish |image = [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|200px]] |caption = In-Game image of the ''Fossilized Fish''. |location =
*[[Underground]] *[[Berry Master]] }} ==Description== The '''Fossilized Fish''' is a type of [[Fossils|Fossil part]]. ==Details== '''Fossilized Fish''' can be combined in the fossil master of Galar to create a new Pok√©mon. ==Mine Layout== The Fossilized Fish appears in the Underground as a 5x4 sized object.

[[File:FossilizedFishMine.png|100px]] ==Uses== {|class="wikitable sortable" ! Location !! Fossils !! Reward!! Cost |- | rowspan=2|[[Shops#Galar|Stow-on-Side Fossil Trader]] || 1x Fossilized Fish [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Drake]] [[File:Fossilized Drake.png|30px]] || [[File:Dracovish.png|40px]] Dracovish || rowspan=2|25,000 {{Questpoints}} |- | 1x Fossilized Fish [[File:Fossilized Fish.png|30px]]
1x [[Fossilized Dino]] [[File:Fossilized Dino.png|30px]] || [[File:Arctovish.png|40px]] Arctovish |} ==Acquisition== The Fossilized Fish can be found in the [[Underground]] and traded for with the [[Berry Master|Hoenn Berry Master]]. {{Underground Items}} [[Category:Items]] [[Category:Fossils]]
revision.comment: Updating to match new version of source page
